title: Nurse Mundo skin
body:
Exactly what you would want. mundo in a female nurse outfit, wielding a giant syringe. throws it too. and he is wearing high heels. ult animation can be a bunch of the + floating around, while the w can be iv fluid or something.
{{champion:36}}

replies.body:
Like that Puri-Puri prisoner from One Punch man?
I'm down for that
Nurse mundo would be hilarious.   I enjoy joke skins, so I would definitely use this if I ever played mundo.
i'd rather it be Doctor Dr. Mundo, with him wearing a lab coat & wielding a scalpel
Weird fetish but I will approve lol.
Might as well make Nurse Sion too
